flawed_nl_solution:
We have to know how many MB are 360GB, 360GB x 1000MB/1GB = <<360000=360000>>360000 MB
The total seconds downloading will be 360000MB / 50MB/second = <<360000/50=72000>>72000 seconds
So she has to wait 72000 seconds / 3600 seconds/1 hour = <<72000/3600=20>>20 hours
#### 20

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 7200, not 72000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
